_meta.description: Design memory for MCP Forge. Updated by the design bot after each approval/rejection cycle. This file IS the learned taste — treat it as sacred.

design_principles: Minimalist, almost empty — like walking into an empty gallery with one perfect piece
Deep purple-black palette (#0D0118 → #1A0A2E), NOT pure black, NOT AI rainbow gradients
Small understated text (14-16px), generous letter-spacing, clean sans-serif
Swiss bank energy, not Silicon Valley — premium, exclusive, trustworthy
No gamification — information not progress bars. Understated, not gamey
Assembly line visual organization — modular, clear flow, Build-a-Bear approach
Ghost-style buttons for primary actions, solid only for destructive
Vast whitespace signals confidence and quality
Orange accent used SPARINGLY — primary actions only, gray for secondary
Toast notifications for feedback, never silent actions
Every page has a consistent header: h1 title + text-sm subtitle describing the page purpose
Hide zero-value stats — show data-dependent sections only when data exists
Use forge-* design tokens in all components, never raw Tailwind colors

component_patterns.empty_states: Icon (w-5 h-5 or w-14 h-14 in circle) + single descriptive sentence + one ghost action button. No sad illustrations. No tips boxes.
component_patterns.cards: Subtle border, no drop shadow, generous padding (p-6 minimum). Hover reveals secondary actions.
component_patterns.loading: Skeleton screens preferred over spinners. Spinners only for <2s operations.
component_patterns.modals: Minimal. One purpose. Easy dismiss. No nested modals ever.
component_patterns.navigation: Sidebar with consistent icon style (all outlined OR all filled, never mixed)
component_patterns.data_display: Tables for structured data, cards for entities, never both on same view
component_patterns.forms: Inline validation, auto-save where possible, explicit save button when not
component_patterns.page_headers: h1 text-2xl font-semibold + p text-sm text-forge-text-secondary mt-1. Always include a subtitle.
component_patterns.quick_actions: Grid of forge-card-hover items with icon in bg-forge-surface circle + label + sublabel. No orange backgrounds.
component_patterns.log_panels: Terminal icon + descriptive text when empty. Auto-scroll to bottom when active.
component_patterns.search_inputs: forge-input with Search icon (w-4) at left. text-sm. No custom styling.
component_patterns.stat_cards: Only show when there is meaningful data. Hide entire section when all values are zero.

accent.primary_usage: Primary actions ONLY — buttons, key indicators. Never decorative.

approved_patterns.description: Fleet Command empty state: icon + one sentence + ghost button. No decorative glow. Stats hidden when no workers. LogEmptyState with Terminal icon.
Dashboard empty state: icon in circle + one sentence + ghost button. Activity feed empty state with Clock icon. Quick actions use bg-forge-surface, not bg-forge-accent/10.

Full design token migration for Build page. CategoryCard, SubcategoryCard, TemplateCard, TemplateDetail all converted from raw Tailwind colors to forge-* tokens. Build button uses forge-btn-ghost. forge-card class for detail sections.
QuickAction and stat card icon backgrounds changed from bg-forge-accent/10, bg-green-500/10, bg-purple-500/10 to bg-forge-surface. Icon colors from brand-specific to text-forge-text-muted.
Projects page header subtitle made consistent (text-sm mt-1). Empty state follows icon-in-circle + sentence pattern with Target icon.

session_log.objective: Improve Fleet Command empty states and visual polish
Comprehensive product improvement — templates, pages, config, design consistency
learnings: All pages need consistent header pattern: h1 + subtitle
Empty states across all pages should use the same pattern
Quick action cards should use bg-forge-surface not accent backgrounds
Search inputs should use forge-input class, not custom styling
Templates need rich descriptions, parameter examples, and enum constraints

session_log.objective: Final design token migration and remaining page consistency
learnings: Build page had 40+ raw Tailwind color classes — all migrated to forge-* tokens
CreatorDashboard stat icons should use neutral bg-forge-surface, not accent-tinted backgrounds
Every empty state in the app now follows the same icon + sentence + optional ghost button pattern
Category gradient colors in data definitions are acceptable — only component-level styling needs forge tokens
forge-card class replaces ad-hoc bg-gray-800/50 border border-gray-700 combinations
